main event: A rocket or missile launch was observed in the vicinity of South Carolina on August 14, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed traveling at extremely high speed and was at an extremely high altitude, burning brightly., The sighting lasted for approximately 1 hour and 15 minutes., The missile launch was verified by SAFOS., Visual sightings came in rapidly before the object disappeared from view after about 3 minutes., The report indicates similar missile launch observations in the area.
location: East of South Carolina, South Carolina, USA
